## CartQueryInterface type

Fields to access carts. Includes direct access to a single cart and searching for carts.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type CartQueryInterface = {
    cart?: Maybe<Cart>;
    carts: CartQueryResult;
};
```
